channel.title: Athanasy 718/735 SPAWN || CUSTOM GEARS || QUICKSPAWN PKING || PKP REWARDS || VPS
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2w6cis2.png[/img]
Forums - [url=http://athanasy.comuv.com/]Athanasy[/url] Downloadable Client - [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/uht79auq68pbfwt/Athanasy%20launcher%20ll.jar?dl=0]https://www.dropbox.com/s/uht79auq68pbfwt/Athanasy%20launcher%20ll.jar?dl=0[/url]
Original Idea/About Athanasy The idea of Athanasy; was to create a spawn server that was not just spawning and PKing, although Athanasy does have quick-gear commands + quicks-pawning methods, it would also have items that could be earned though a shop of some sort.(Not bought) The idea behind the PKP shop is to create a drive for players, light a fire under their a$s, something to really motivate them into PKing. Unlocking items though the PKP shop does not give you the item, but allows you to spawn + equip that item.
Game Content
- Custom gear loadouts [ gear main, gear main2, gear zerk, gear zerk2, gear f2p, gear welfare, gear pure, gear nh ] - VPS hosted - 24/7 Uptime - Near perfect item switching - Near perfect combat [ Hybriding ] - Active community + staff - Old + New Tokhaar-kal models - Customisable titles & colors - Customisable yell tags/shades/colors - 100% Clan wars - 100% lodestone network with lock + unlock - Nearly all stats trainable - User friendly content - Forum guides + tips - Starter bank - Friendly + active staff

@Athanasy wrote:

[CENTER]

Forums - Athanasy
Downloadable Client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/uht79auq68pbfwt/Athanasy%20launcher%20ll.jar?dl=0

Original Idea/About Athanasy
The idea of Athanasy; was to create a spawn server that was not just spawning and PKing, although Athanasy does have quick-gear commands + quicks-pawning methods, it would also have items that could be earned though a shop of some sort.(Not bought)
The idea behind the PKP shop is to create a drive for players, light a fire under their a$s, something to really motivate them into PKing.
Unlocking items though the PKP shop does not give you the item, but allows you to spawn + equip that item.

Game Content

  • Custom gear loadouts [ gear main, gear main2, gear zerk, gear zerk2, gear f2p, gear welfare, gear pure, gear nh ]
  • VPS hosted - 24/7 Uptime
  • Near perfect item switching
  • Near perfect combat [ Hybriding ]
  • Active community + staff
  • Old + New Tokhaar-kal models
  • Customisable titles & colors
  • Customisable yell tags/shades/colors
  • 100% Clan wars
  • 100% lodestone network with lock + unlock
  • Nearly all stats trainable
